alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Valley; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 2:03AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * WHERE...Cave Creek/New River, Fountain Hills/East Mesa, Superior, Apache Junction/Gold Canyon and The Northwest Valley of the Phoenix Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Valley; Superior
